name: google-cloud-compute
label: Google Cloud Compute
description: Google Compute Engine's tooling and workflow supports to create advanced networks on the regional levels and load balancing capabilities in cloud computing. This connector facilitates automated operation related to GCE operations.

fields.title: Upload Service Account JSON File
fields.name: auth_file
fields.tooltip: The service account private key file.
fields.description: The service account private key file.

operations.title: List Instances within Zone
operations.description: Retrieves the list of instances contained within the specified zone.

parameters.title: Zone
parameters.name: zone
parameters.tooltip: The name of the zone for this request.
parameters.description: The name of the zone for this request.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: The operator must be either '=', '!=', '>', '<','><=','>=' or ':'. For example, 'name != example-instance'.
parameters.description: A filter expression that filters resources listed in the response.

parameters.title: OrderBy
parameters.name: order_by
parameters.tooltip: Sorts list results by a certain order. By default, results are returned in alphanumerical order based on the resource name.e.g. orderBy="creationTimestamp desc"
parameters.description: Sorts list results by a certain order. By default, results are returned in alphanumerical order based on the resource name.

parameters.title: Page Token
parameters.name: page_token
parameters.tooltip: Specifies a page token to get that specified page of results.
parameters.description: Specifies a page token to use.

parameters.title: Max Results
parameters.name: max_results
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results per page that should be returned. Acceptable values are 0 to 500, inclusive. (Default: 500)
parameters.description: The maximum number of results per page that should be returned. Acceptable values are 0 to 500, inclusive. (Default: 500)

operations.title: Get Instance Details
operations.description: Returns the specified Instance resource details.

parameters.title: Zone
parameters.name: zone
parameters.tooltip: The name of the zone for this request. e.g. us-west4-b.
parameters.description: The name of the zone for this request.

parameters.title: Resource ID
parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.tooltip: Provide the name of the instance. e.g. instance-1.
parameters.description: Name of the instance resource to return.

operations.title: Start Instance
operations.description: Starts an instance that you have specified using the resource ID.

parameters.title: Zone
parameters.name: zone
parameters.tooltip: Provide the name of the zone. e.g. us-west4-b
parameters.description: The name of the zone for this request.

parameters.title: Resource ID
parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.tooltip: Provide the name of the instance. e.g. instance-1.
parameters.description: Name of the instance resource to return.

operations.title: Stop Instance
operations.description: Stops an instance that you have specified using the resource ID.

parameters.title: Zone
parameters.name: zone
parameters.tooltip: Provide the name of the zone. e.g. us-west4-b
parameters.description: The name of the zone for this request.

parameters.title: Resource ID
parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.tooltip: Provide the name of the instance. e.g. instance-1.
parameters.description: Name of the instance resource to return.

operations.title: Delete Instance
operations.description: Deletes an instance resource that you have specified using the resource ID.

parameters.title: Zone
parameters.name: zone
parameters.tooltip: Provide the name of the zone. e.g. us-west4-b
parameters.description: The name of the zone for this request.

parameters.title: Resource ID
parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.tooltip: Provide the name of the instance. e.g. instance-1.
parameters.description: Name of the instance resource to return.

operations.title: Reset Instance
operations.description: This is a hard reset the VM does not do a graceful shutdown. Performs a reset on the instance that you have specified using the resource ID.

parameters.title: Zone
parameters.name: zone
parameters.tooltip: Provide the name of the zone. e.g. us-west4-b
parameters.description: The name of the zone for this request.

parameters.title: Resource ID
parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.tooltip: Provide the name of the instance. e.g. instance-1.
parameters.description: Name of the instance resource to return.

operations.title: Aggregated List Instances
operations.description: Retrieves an aggregated list of all of the instances in your project across all regions and zones.

parameters.title: Include all scopes
parameters.name: include_all_scopes
parameters.tooltip: Indicates whether every visible scope for each scope type (zone, region, global) should be included in the response. For resource types which predate this field, if this flag is omitted or false, only scopes of the scope types where the resource type is expected to be found will be included.
parameters.description: Indicates whether every visible scope for each scope type (zone, region, global) should be included in the response. For resource types which predate this field, if this flag is omitted or false, only scopes of the scope types where the resource type is expected to be found will be included.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: The operator must be either '=', '!=', '>', '<','><=','>=' or ':'. For example, 'name != example-instance'.
parameters.description: A filter expression that filters resources listed in the response.

parameters.title: OrderBy
parameters.name: order_by
parameters.tooltip: Sorts list results by a certain order. By default, results are returned in alphanumerical order based on the resource name.
parameters.description: Sorts list results by a certain order. By default, results are returned in alphanumerical order based on the resource name.

parameters.title: Page Token
parameters.name: page_token
parameters.tooltip: Specifies a page token to get that specified page of results.
parameters.description: Specifies a page token to use.

parameters.title: Max Results
parameters.name: max_results
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results per page that should be returned.
parameters.description: The maximum number of results per page that should be returned.

parameters.title: Return partial success
parameters.name: return_partial_success
parameters.tooltip: Opt-in for partial success behavior which provides partial results in case of failure. The default value is false.
parameters.description: Opt-in for partial success behavior which provides partial results in  case of failure. The default value is false.

operations.title: Set Instance Label
